meanings.definition: To wear or display in a proud or confident manner.
meanings.sent1: She sported her new dress at the party.
meanings.sent2: He sported a big smile after winning the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat sported a mischievous look as it knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The sun sported its golden rays across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The champion sported the trophy proudly for all to see.
